ABOUT.TITLE: About Us
ABOUT.HISTORY_TEXT: PNW was founded in 2023 with the vision of creating a different sports betting platform, focused on user experience and offering a safe and responsible environment for sports enthusiasts.
ABOUT.MISSION_TEXT: At PNW, our mission is to transform the sports betting experience, combining advanced technology with a user-centered approach to create a platform that is fun, fair, and transparent.
ABOUT.TRANSPARENCY_TEXT: We operate with complete clarity in all our practices.
ABOUT.RESPONSIBILITY_TEXT: We promote responsible gaming and offer tools to help our users.
ABOUT.INNOVATION_TEXT: We constantly seek new ways to improve our platform.
ABOUT.SECURITY_TEXT: Protecting our users' data and funds is our priority.
ABOUT.EXCELLENCE_TEXT: We strive to offer the best possible service in all aspects.
ABOUT.TEAM_TEXT: We have a team of professionals passionate about sports and technology, dedicated to creating the best experience for our users.

FAQ.TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.CREATE_ACCOUNT: How can I create an account?
FAQ.CREATE_ACCOUNT_ANSWER: To create an account, click on the 'Register' button at the top right of the page. Fill out the form with your personal details, create a secure password, and accept the terms and conditions. Then, click 'Register' to complete the process.
FAQ.PLACE_BET: How can I place a bet?
FAQ.PLACE_BET_ANSWER: To place a bet, you must first log in to your account. Then, browse through the available sports, select an event, and click on the odds you want to bet on. Enter the amount you want to bet in the betting slip and click 'Place Bet' to confirm.
FAQ.REDEEM_POINTS: How can I redeem my points for prizes?
FAQ.REDEEM_POINTS_ANSWER: To redeem your points for prizes, go to the 'Prizes' section in the main menu. There you will see all available prizes and the points required for each one. Click the 'Redeem' button next to the prize you want and confirm your selection.
FAQ.DAILY_WHEEL: How does the daily fortune wheel work?
FAQ.DAILY_WHEEL_ANSWER: The daily fortune wheel is a reward you can claim once every 24 hours. Click on the wheel icon in the navigation bar and then on 'Spin Wheel'. You will win random points that will be automatically added to your account.
FAQ.FORGOT_PASSWORD: What should I do if I forgot my password?
FAQ.FORGOT_PASSWORD_ANSWER: If you forgot your password, click on 'Login' and then on the 'Forgot your password?' link below the login form. Enter your email address and you will receive instructions to reset your password.
FAQ.CONTACT_SUPPORT: How can I contact customer service?
FAQ.CONTACT_SUPPORT_ANSWER: You can contact our customer service through various options: live chat available 24/7, email at support@pnw.com, or through the contact form in the 'Support' section of our website.
FAQ.PRIZE_PROCESSING: How long does it take to process prize redemptions?
FAQ.PRIZE_PROCESSING_ANSWER: Prize redemptions are typically processed within 24 to 48 business hours. Once processed, you will receive an email notification and you can view the status of your prize in the 'My Prizes' section of your profile.
FAQ.CHANGE_USERNAME_ANSWER: Yes, you can change your username. Go to 'My Profile', click on 'Edit Profile', and update your username in the corresponding field. Note that the username must be unique and cannot be in use by another user.
FAQ.VIEW_HISTORY: How can I view my betting history?
FAQ.VIEW_HISTORY_ANSWER: To view your betting history, go to 'My Profile' and click on the 'History' tab. There you can see all your previous bets, including details such as the amount bet, odds, outcome, and winnings.

FOOTER.RESPONSIBLE_TEXT: Play responsibly. Only for people over 18 years old.

HOME.PLATFORM_TITLE: PNW: A Platform Committed to Responsible Gambling
HOME.PLATFORM_DESCRIPTION: We are more than just a sports prediction website. Our main goal is to fight gambling addiction by offering:
HOME.PLATFORM_FEATURE_1: Self-control tools with time limits and customizable predictions
HOME.PLATFORM_FEATURE_2: A reward system designed to encourage offline activities
HOME.PLATFORM_FEATURE_3: Real-life experiences to help you reconnect with the outside world
HOME.PLATFORM_FEATURE_4: Professional support and resources for those in need

HOW_TO_PLAY.TITLE: How to Play
HOW_TO_PLAY.STEP_1_TEXT: To get started, register on our platform by clicking "Register" at the top of the page. Fill out the form with your personal details and create a secure password.
HOW_TO_PLAY.STEP_2_TEXT: Browse through our wide selection of sporting events. You can filter by sport, league, or date to find the events that interest you the most.
HOW_TO_PLAY.STEP_3_TEXT: Click on the event you're interested in to see all available markets. Select the odds you want to bet on by clicking on them.
HOW_TO_PLAY.STEP_4_TEXT: Enter the amount you want to bet in the betting slip. Verify the details and confirm your bet by clicking "Place Bet".
HOW_TO_PLAY.STEP_5_TEXT: You can follow the progress of your bets in the "My Bets" section of your profile. There you will see the status of your active bets and can check your history.
HOW_TO_PLAY.TIP_1: Start with small bets until you become familiar with the platform.
HOW_TO_PLAY.TIP_2: Get well informed about the events you're going to bet on.
HOW_TO_PLAY.TIP_3: Set a budget and stick to it.
HOW_TO_PLAY.TIP_4: Take advantage of our promotions to maximize your winnings.

PRIVACY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
PRIVACY.INTRO_TEXT: At PNW, we take the privacy of our users very seriously. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
PRIVACY.SECTION_1_INTRO: We may collect the following types of information:
PRIVACY.REGISTRATION_INFO_TEXT: Name, email address, date of birth, etc.
PRIVACY.TRANSACTION_INFO_TEXT: Details of your bets, deposits, and withdrawals.
PRIVACY.TECHNICAL_INFO_TEXT: IP address, browser type, device used, etc.
PRIVACY.USAGE_INFO_TEXT: How you interact with our website and services.
PRIVACY.USE_3: Verify your identity and prevent fraud
PRIVACY.USE_4: Communicate with you about our services
PRIVACY.USE_5: Comply with legal and regulatory obligations
PRIVACY.SECTION_3_INTRO: We do not sell your personal information to third parties. We may share your information with:
PRIVACY.SHARE_1: Service providers that help us operate our business
PRIVACY.SHARE_3: Affiliated entities within our corporate group
PRIVACY.SECTION_4_TEXT: We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, loss, or alteration.
PRIVACY.SECTION_5_INTRO: Depending on your location, you may have the right to:
PRIVACY.RIGHT_4: Object to the processing of your data
PRIVACY.SECTION_6_TEXT: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. We will notify you of any significant changes through our website or by email.
PRIVACY.SECTION_7_TEXT: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us through our Contact section.

RESPONSIBLE_GAMING.TITLE: Responsible Gaming
RESPONSIBLE_GAMING.INTRO_1: At PNW, we are committed to promoting a safe and responsible gaming environment. We believe that sports betting should be a form of entertainment, not a source of problems.
RESPONSIBLE_GAMING.INTRO_2: We encourage you to follow these guidelines to maintain control of your gaming activity and enjoy a positive experience.
RESPONSIBLE_GAMING.SET_LIMITS_TEXT: Define a clear budget for your bets and don't exceed it. Decide how much time and money you're willing to dedicate to betting and respect those limits.
RESPONSIBLE_GAMING.DONT_CHASE_LOSSES_TEXT: Accepting losses is part of the game. Don't try to recover lost money by increasing your bets, as this can lead to a dangerous cycle.
RESPONSIBLE_GAMING.KEEP_BALANCE_TEXT: Sports betting should be just one part of your leisure activities. Make sure to maintain a healthy balance with other social and recreational activities.
RESPONSIBLE_GAMING.NO_INFLUENCE_TEXT: Avoid betting when you're under the influence of alcohol or other substances, as this can affect your ability to make rational decisions.
RESPONSIBLE_GAMING.TAKE_BREAKS_TEXT: It's important to take regular breaks. If you feel you're spending too much time betting, consider taking a break.
RESPONSIBLE_GAMING.TOOLS_INTRO: We offer several tools to help you maintain control of your gaming activity:
RESPONSIBLE_GAMING.DEPOSIT_LIMITS_TEXT: Set daily, weekly, or monthly limits for your deposits.
RESPONSIBLE_GAMING.TIME_LIMITS_TEXT: Configure reminders that alert you about how long you've been playing.
RESPONSIBLE_GAMING.SELF_EXCLUSION_TEXT: If you need a longer break, you can self-exclude from our platform.
RESPONSIBLE_GAMING.ACCOUNT_HISTORY_TEXT: Review your betting history to keep track of your activity.
RESPONSIBLE_GAMING.HELP_TEXT: If you or someone you know has problems with gambling, help is available. Contact one of these specialized organizations:

REWARDS.COME_BACK: Come back tomorrow for more rewards

TERMS.TITLE: Terms and Conditions
TERMS.WELCOME: Welcome to PNW. By accessing or using our service, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. Please read them carefully.
TERMS.SECTION_1_TEXT: By registering, accessing or using our services, you confirm that you have read, understood and accepted these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you may not access the service.
TERMS.SECTION_2_TEXT: To use our services, you must be at least 18 years old and reside in a jurisdiction where online betting is legal. It is your responsibility to ensure that your use of our services complies with applicable laws in your jurisdiction.
TERMS.SECTION_3_TEXT: When creating an account, you agree to provide accurate, complete and up-to-date information. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password, and agree not to share your access credentials with third parties.
TERMS.SECTION_4_TEXT: All bets are subject to our betting rules. We reserve the right to refuse any bet at our discretion. Payments will be processed in accordance with our payment policies.
TERMS.SECTION_5_TEXT: We promote responsible gaming and offer tools to help users control their gaming activity. If you believe you may have a gambling problem, we recommend seeking professional help.
TERMS.SECTION_6_TEXT: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will take effect immediately after posting. Your continued use of the service after any changes constitutes your acceptance of the new terms.
